site.title: Photo upload for Christian and Alyssa's Wedding!
site.description: Upload photos here for Christian and Alyssa's wedding weekend.

home.title: capture the love
home.subtitle: Please share your photos with Christian and Alyssa by using this website to upload photos you've captured from their wedding! You can find links to their wedding registry and wedding schedule here as well.
home.smallFooter: Having issues with photo upload? Feel free to upload to Google Photos.
